actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

official_title: To make certain modifications with respect to overtime pay and premium pay of customs officers.

summary.text: Amends specified Federal law with respect to overtime, premium, and differential pay for customs officers. Revises requirements for the fiscal year cap on the aggregate of overtime pay of a customs officer and for waivers of such limitation. Prohibits payment of overtime or premium pay to any customs officer who has not actually performed work during the time corresponding to such pay. Revises provisions relating to night work differential pay of customs officers.

titles.title: To make certain modifications with respect to overtime pay and premium pay of customs officers.
